name: Square Battle (ApeSign)
description:
This game was made in 8 hours, during a train ride :D

It's far away from a finished game, but I still hope it's fun to play. The purpus of the game was mainly to try out some features I want to use in future projects.

Controlls

Movement: A, D;

Fire: LMB;

Open and close store: Tab or E;
